transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: This is Sarah from Recovery Solutions. Look, you owe $5,200 and you need to pay this NOW. We're tired of your excuses.

transcript.speaker: client
transcript.text: Wait, I don't understand what this is about.

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: Don't play dumb with me. If you don't pay today, we're going to garnish your wages and take everything you own. You'll lose your house!

transcript.speaker: client
transcript.text: This doesn't sound right. I need more information.

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: You're just trying to dodge your responsibilities. Pay up or face the consequences. We can make your life very difficult.
